text: Tomorrow, 22nd of December - the last Radio Robida session starting at 7:00 and finishing at 22:00!
Check the programme on our website: https://radio.robidacollective.com
Come and say “Hi!” - click on the “Join the Chat” and send some christmas wishes to the Robida community 💛
Morning Reading Room at 7.00 → on meadowing from Midsummr Song by Maria Sledmere
And don’t forget about the ambient channel - sounds of Topolò, all day long.
